General.Name: clearvise AG
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: clearvise AG operates as an independent electricity producer from renewable energies in Europe. Its operational portfolio consists of wind and solar parks, and a biogas plant in four countries with an installed capacity of approximately 303 MW. The company was formerly known as ABO Invest AG and changed its name to clearvise AG in 2020. clearvise AG was founded in 2010 and is based in Wiesbaden, Germany.
